description:
The 30-year computing crisis rages on because it is too hard to do a
good job! Here we present a new and improved DevOps paradigm, which
makes it easy to build simple and reliable systems. This is a Software
Silver Bullet!

Steve Jackson Bio
-----------------

I am an Electrical Engineer and I have been programming since 1968. CEO
of a private company for 30 years, developing and manufacturing embedded
systems.
title: Simple made easy
